description: Roberta Hayes, a professional flutist and teacher for over 34 years, will teach you everything you need to know about playing the flute, from the beginning to the intermediate level.  This course is designed for beginners.  You will start with the basics and work through a variety of lessons to get to the intermediate stage.  Within a short time, you will be playing songs and melodies to impress your friends and family, as well as bring a lifetime of enjoyment to your own life.
title: Beginning Flute Lessons
